Python api wrapper for Kong API Gatway


* Free software: MIT license
* Documentation: https://python-kong-management.readthedocs.io.

Testing
---------
```bash
cp .env.example .env
python3 -m venv venv
source venv
eval $(cat .env | sed 's/^/export /')
setup.py pytest
```
